title: Designing Improved Accessibility for Cultural Heritage Through Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening capacity to address cultural heritage accessibility issues through VR simulation for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can design cultural heritage interpretation content using digital storytelling techniques in VR environments.
Learners can create disability-friendly cultural heritage explanations by applying storytelling structures that minimize cognitive load.
Learners can propose practical accessibility improvement plans applicable to real cultural heritage sites through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
